page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES, BROMSGROVE
page.content: We interviewed children aged three to nine years of age, asking them about their favourite games played in the school playground and at home, both in the garden and indoors. The favourite games overall were chasing games of different kinds. These were played in all the areas we queried.Children of all ages enjoyed riding bicycles;many children played with "doll" figures. Playing indoors, board games and construction toys were very popular, whilst out of doors, children chose to play on climbing equipment. Imaginary games and ball games were played by groups of children, whilst other children preferred playing by themselves with skipping ropes, puzzles and computers. In conclusion, no game appeared to be exclusive to any age group or sex.
